segments.text: What makes you think you are able to do the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My major is Automobile Designing and I have received my master's degree in science . I think I can do it well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of work were you responsible for in the past employment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am a student engineer who mainly took charge of understanding of the mechanical strength and corrosion resistance of various materials .
segments.speaker: S2
